name: RogueASCII
description:
A Roguelike with ASCII art but with realistic sounds and light/shadows. (+INFO)

This is just a prototype made in Construct 3. Did a mockup as fun and after some attention developed the idea.

Only (Map) & (Stats) panel works. There are no much things to do but gives an overall idea of what it can be. You can walk around, cut trees and pick items(coins & rings). >> For more news about gamedev: HERE .

Hope you like it!

---

F : Toggle Fullscreen

C: Cut the tree (When one selected)

WASD & Arrows: Move player

Mouse: Select cell to move player & Select objects
